Text:  Clearfield County Courthouse is a historic courthouse located in Clearfield Pennsylvania United States. It is located directly across from another historic landmark the Dimeling Hotel. It features a square brick clock tower with a bell shaped roof.It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1979.

Text:  Heterolepis is a genus of flowering plants in the family Asteraceae. It has three or four species all endemic to the Western Cape South Africa. Heterolepis species are shrublets typically sprawling and about 30 cm high with moderately large yellow flowers. The flowerheads are solitary with glandular peduncles the surrounding green bracts having membranous margins especially in the inner rows. The ray florets are female with a thread-like lobe opposite the ray.
